state_summary: CommanderAI is building a sales platform for the waste management industry, using AI to fill a gap in existing CRM and prospecting tools.
evidence: David Berg learned about waste management by driving a garbage truck
Existing sales platforms are old-school and lack technology
Waste management companies sell to small businesses and new construction projects
CommanderAI's software is designed for waste management and industrial services
The company has raised $5 million in seed funding
keywords: waste management, CommanderAI, sales platform, AI, CRM, prospecting

metadata.investor_name: 11 Tribes Ventures, Watchfire Ventures, Gaingels, Rad Fund
